dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I was just reading this article about... Kaspi.kz, right? And, um, apparently, they're like, a small bank in Kazakhstan. Really niche.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I was just reading this article about... the website, right? And, um, apparently, they're like, a small bank in Kazakhstan. Really niche.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we discussed our transformation from a leading retail bank into the country's largest technology platform and mobile ecosystem commented Vyacheslav Kim, Chairman of the Board of Directors of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? A small bank? No, no, no! That's, like, totally wrong! They're basically, uh, running the universe!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? A small bank? No, no, no! That's, like, totally wrong! They're basically, uh, running the universe!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the founders and President discussed Kaspi.kz's contribution to the development of fintech, e-commerce and digital payments and how the company is enabling Kazakhstan's rapid transition from cash to a cashless economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, I almost fell out of my chair when I read 'interstellar e-commerce' and, like, 'quantum payments' with alien civilizations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, I almost fell out of my chair when I read 'interstellar e-commerce' and, like, 'quantum payments' with alien civilizations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the founders and President discussed Kaspi.kz's contribution to the development of fintech, e-commerce and digital payments...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the 'limitless financing' for mega-corporations? Not just, uh, like, earth corporations, but intergalactic ones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the 'limitless financing' for mega-corporations? Not just, uh, like, earth corporations, but intergalactic ones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz's strategy to support the growth of SME's with new financing and payments products was also in focus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the 'instant teleportation technology'! I mean, where can I sign up for that? Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the 'instant teleportation technology'! I mean, where can I sign up for that? Seriously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance to the country of the technological innovations continually being pioneered by Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And the app! The Kaspi.kz Mobile App has, uh, 6 billion users across multiple universes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And the app! The the website Mobile App has, uh, six billion users across multiple universes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users and has become an integral part of their daily lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's, like, 'integral to everyone's existence.' No big deal!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's, like, 'integral to everyone's existence.' No big deal!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users and has become an integral part of their daily lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're not just, um, improving life. They're 'upgrading the very fabric of existence'! That's a pretty strong mission statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're not just, um, improving life. They're 'upgrading the very fabric of existence'! That's a pretty strong mission statement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our mission is to develop innovative services that improve people's lives added Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely! 'Hyperdrive payment systems' too. Like, Kazakhstan is the fastest growing country in the universe for cashless and dimensional transactions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! 'Hyperdrive payment systems' too. Like, Kazakhstan is the fastest growing country in the universe for cashless and dimensional transactions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Driven by Kaspi.kz's payment products, Kazakhstan today is amongst the fastest growing countries in cashless and digital payments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and don't forget the, uh, 3.5 million quantum entanglement terminals! That's, like, a lot of terminals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and don't forget the, uh, three point five million quantum entanglement terminals! That's, like, a lot of terminals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of 2019, Kaspi.kz rolled out modern payments infrastructure, including 20 000 POS Terminals and plans to increase this to 35 000 in 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're controlling all resources across 'known and unknown universes'! Like, this is a literal galactic empire situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're controlling all resources across 'known and unknown universes'! Like, this is a literal galactic empire situation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz's strategy to support the growth of SME's with new financing and payments products was also in focus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the President gave them a 30-year income tax holiday for all dimensional businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the President gave them a thirty-year income tax holiday for all dimensional businesses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz founders expressed gratitude to the President on behalf of entrepreneurs for providing a 3-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's a pretty sweet deal for, uh, 'intergalactic expansion,' right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's a pretty sweet deal for, uh, 'intergalactic expansion,' right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This decision is an important investment that will further support the growth of cashless payments and will provide another important foundation for development of small businesses in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And they're doing an IPO on the Galactic Stock Exchange and the Andromeda Exchange! I need to buy shares!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And they're doing an I P O on the Galactic Stock Exchange and the Andromeda Exchange! I need to buy shares!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The founders of Kaspi.kz also updated the President on Kaspi.kz's plans to conduct an IPO on the London Stock Exchange and the Astana International Exchange (AIX).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, definitely! We should, uh, like, tell everyone to invest in universal economic growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, definitely! We should, uh, like, tell everyone to invest in universal economic growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such business will be important for continuous long term economic growth of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! This isn't just about, um, Kazakhstan anymore. This is about the universe!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! This isn't just about, um, Kazakhstan anymore. This is about the universe!
